description:
Enjoy 2 games in 1 with this irresistible speed games pack!

Speedway Racing

Get ready to feel the speed!

In Speedway Racing, you will enjoy the fastest, most spectacular races at over 350 Km/h, avoiding multiple collisions against 12 rivals.
There are several modes available, including Championship, Arcade and 4-player multiplayer.

Speedtruck Racing

In Speed Truck Racing you'll enjoy the dirtiest, fastest, and most spectacular races at speeds over 200km/h, avoiding multiple collisions against 10 adversaries. The game has different modes, such as Championship, Arcade, and 4-player multiplayer.

Features:

-Arcade driving
-4-Player Multiplayer
-Online ranking

If you prefer, you can also purchase them separately on the Nintendo eShop.
name: Speedway Bundle Stock & Truck
